content: Backtrack on yourself and go straight up through the path on the left between the rocks. Head for the lava stream running from the ceiling straight up ahead but stop to kill the last Flamling on the right, just behind the rock, and harvest the Fire Date from the tree on the right.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'A Note on Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
Backtrack on yourself and go straight up through the path on the left between the rocks. Head for the lava stream running from the ceiling straight up ahead but stop to kill the last Flamling on the right, just behind the rock, and harvest the Fire Date from the tree on the right.
